amendment.description: To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the management plan for contractor security personnel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3476 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3476 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7270-7273; text: CR S7272) To provide for appropriate coordination in the preparation of the management plan for contractor security personnel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3476 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3476 proposed by Senator Warner.
